content.rendered:
[vc_row type=”container”][vc_column width=”1/2″][vc_column_text]Accu-Beam® Fiberoptic Handpieces are a cost effective solution to guide laser fibers during orthopedic surgery, general surgery, neurosurgery, ENT, and oral surgery. They can be customized for resellers and bulk orders to have various lengths, gauges, colors, shapes, and engravings. All handpieces are re-usable and sterilizable.

  • Available in Malleable or Rigid with various shapes
  • Custom color anodizing and engraving available
  • Sterilizable, less waste than disposable handpieces
  • Available in almost any specified length
  • Can fit almost any laser fiber from 11ga to 16ga

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][vc_column width=”1/2″][vc_gallery type=”flexslider_slide” interval=”3″ images=”72888,72903″ img_size=”400×267″ css=”.vc_custom_1574816943599{padding-top: 0px !important;}”][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row type=”container”][vc_column][vc_separator color=”#e5e5e5″ type=”normal” thickness=”1″ up=”” down=””][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row type=”container”][vc_column][vc_column_text]

Custom Handpieces

[/vc_column_text][vc_column_text]Have re-usable and sterilizable Fiberoptic Handpieces made to your specifications including color, engraving, shape, size, gauge, and malleability. If you don’t see a configuration on our site that meets your needs just request a quote with your desired specifications.

These handpieces are available in various gauges to be compatible with almost any laser fiber. Varying lengths and shapes allow for the perfect handpiece no matter the procedure or patient.[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row type=”container”][vc_column][vc_tta_tabs color=”white” active_section=”1″][vc_tta_section title=”Compatibility” tab_id=”1569386751404-824b66ba-0d540fe6-050d”][vc_column_text]Compatible with most laser fibers.[/vc_column_text][/vc_tta_section][vc_tta_section title=”Regulatory” tab_id=”1569386751419-a33a2db6-6e3d0fe6-050d”][vc_column_text]Fiberoptic Handpieces are class 2 devices, and are approved to bear the CE mark.

TTI Medical is registered with the FDA and ISO 13485:2016 certified.[/vc_column_text][/vc_tta_section][vc_tta_section title=”Warranty” tab_id=”1569387831165-1b59dea1-014a0fe6-050d”][vc_column_text]

All of our products include a 1 year manufacturer’s warranty and support for the usable lifetime of the product.

[/vc_column_text][/vc_tta_section][/vc_tta_tabs][/vc_column][/vc_row]
